landing.heroText: With ThriveAlive.Ai, you get a consultant in your pocket: instant access to structured tools and subject-matter experts to help you chart your course, take action, and reach your goals
landing.howTextOne: Discover the values, aspirations, and motivations that guide your life.
landing.howTextTwo: Receive AI-powered guidance from brand expert, Pete Canalichio, tailored to your unique journey.
landing.howTextThree: Use the insights to shape not just your finances, but your future.
landing.differentSub: We’re not another chatbot or online course. We’re your expert guide, built for real outcomes.
landing.differentFirstText: Every guided conversation ends with a clear, usable result—like a strategy draft action plan, or narrative you can plug straight into your resume, pitch, or project.
landing.differentSecondText: Access ThriveAlive whenever it fits your life—even for just five minutes at a time. Short, guided sessions let you make real progress without blocking your day.
landing.differentThirdText: ThriveAlive combines smart AI with real human oversight to give you trustworthy, high-quality outputs you can count on.
landing.differentFourthText: No wandering or guesswork. ThriveAlive uses structured flows built by subject-matter experts to move you from reflection to real deliverables—fast.
landing.differentFifthTitle: Professional Expertise at a Fraction of the Cost
landing.differentFifthText: Get the caliber of advice you’d expect from top-tier consultants—but without the traditional price tag.
landing.differentSixthText: Built from the ground up for sensitive contexts—your data stays secure, your experience stays respectful, and your progress stays your own.
landing.mentorOneText: Pete Canalichio is an award-winning author of the Amazon #1 New Release, "Expand, Grow, Thrive" (2018), “Strategic Brand Licensing” (2024) and a TEDx speaker. He has worked in brand strategy, expansion and licensing for the past 20 years for Coca-Cola, Newell Brands and most recently, BrandAlive, a Service-Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business.
landing.mentorTwoText: Pete believes people deserve to be delighted with new and innovative products and services from brands they love. He also believes every brand owner and organization has the right to expand, grow and ultimately thrive. That is why he has made it his mission to develop tools, talks and training designed to inspire, educate and empower his clients to write a better story, and from it, to achieve all that is possible
landing.mentorSubtitle: Discover a diverse group of experienced professionals dedicated to guiding you towards success. Each mentor brings unique expertise and a passion for helping you grow
landing.modulesSubitle: Find The Best Modules With Us
landing.moduleTextOne: Personal growth is a journey, from self-awareness to confidence, clarity, and purpose. Whether you’re an entrepreneur, creative, or professional, we help you discover what makes you unique and build a personal brand around it. From refining your message to shaping your online presence and visual identity, we provide the tools and support you need to stand out authentically and grow with intention.
landing.plansSubtitle: Whether you’re an individual looking for focused support or an organization            aiming to empower your members, ThriveAlive.Ai adapts to your needs.            We offer flexible plans for individuals and scalable solutions for organizations            like businesses, schools, and mission-driven organizations/non-profits.
landing.planIndDescription: Affordable, self-directed access to expert-guided modules and actionable               insights—perfect for professionals, students, or anyone who wants a ‘consultant in their pocket’.
landing.plansOrgDescription: Bring ThriveAlive.Ai to your members.  We partner with companies,                non-profits,  educational institutions, and other organizations to                give large groups access to expert-guided modules, data-driven                insights, and branded dashboards.
landing.plansTitle: Choose the Plan That Fits You
